title: How to Get Rid of a Pesky Mole

steps.headline: Verify that you have moles.
steps.description: Moles leave tunnels in the ground marked by lines of slightly raised earth.

steps.headline: Once it's verified, you have to stop and think, why would I have moles?
steps.description: They are probably attracted to an ample food source. They are making a buffet of your yard!

steps.headline: Moles typically dine on bugs, so eliminating their food source will send them looking elsewhere.
steps.description: Start keeping a regular routine of applying lawn pesticide to minimize grubs and such. Take a look at the link included below. It gives a really good breakdown on all types of moles.

text: Verify that you have moles. Moles leave tunnels in the ground marked by lines of slightly raised earth. Once it's verified, you have to stop and think, why would I have moles? They are probably attracted to an ample food source. They are making a buffet of your yard! Moles typically dine on bugs, so eliminating their food source will send them looking elsewhere. Start keeping a regular routine of applying lawn pesticide to minimize grubs and such. Take a look at the link included below. It gives a really good breakdown on all types of moles.
